snippet: South Africa expelled three Rwandan diplomats it linked to a raid on an exiled Rwandan general’s Johannesburg home, and Rwanda has retaliated by asking six South African envoys to leave, officials said Friday.
abstract: South Africa expels three Rwandan diplomats it linked to a raid on an exiled Rwandan general’s Johannesburg home, and Rwanda retaliates by asking six South African envoys to leave.
lead_paragraph: South Africa expelled three Rwandan diplomats it linked to a raid on an exiled Rwandan general’s Johannesburg home, and Rwanda has retaliated by asking six South African envoys to leave, officials said Friday.

headline.main: South Africa’s Diplomatic Dispute With Rwanda Grows
headline.print_headline: South Africa: Diplomatic Dispute With Rwanda Grows
